product_name: Jagwire Disc Brake Pads for Shimano Disc Brakes
long_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Shimano disk brakes. HeatShield(R) technology resists heat buildup; brakes stay cool and improve control in critical situations. Special compound minimizes squeal when braking. Set of two. Compatible with Shimano M515, M515-M, M515-LA, M525, M525-LA, M465. M475, M495 and Nexave C501and C601 models.
short_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed for use with Shimano disk brakes.
